title: Count Limit
description: Maximum number of items per photo

title: Counting Templates
description: Access to all existing Counting Templates and future updates

title: Define Counting Area
description: Draw an area and count only the items you need

title: Adjust Object Size
description: Improve counting accuracy and speed by selecting the object size range

title: Review Large Counts
description: Additional way to easily correct photos with large number of items

title: Specify Location for Saved Results
description: Save the input photo, the image with the counting results and the editable version to a specific location on your device

title: Save Results in CSV
description: Save counting results data in csv format

title: Cloud Synchronization
description: Save your results on the cloud (Dropbox, Google Drive or OneDrive)

title: Customizable Forms for Inventory
description: Improve your inventory tracking by adding forms to the counting process

title: Batch Counting
description: Automated counting of multiple batches of photos

title: GoPro Integration
description: Count from the GoPro camera's live feed

title: Database integration
description: Add automated counting to your current inventory system (SQL, SAP, Oracle, etc)

title: Customizable Reports, Ticket or Labels
description: Create your own reports based on count results and form entries

title: Unattended Automated Counting
description: Automatically count items without user intervention when the images are dropped into a specific folder
